response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation, which I believe could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its exceptional nature, I propose a price of $500,000 for this product. I am confident that this investment would yield substantial returns based on its quality and rarity. I look forward to discussing the details with you further. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 500000}
